title: Thanks for all you do @Targons Blade.
body:
I see you on the  Help and Support boards almost every day doing your best to help people. It's stuff like that why I appreciate Riot.

-Reformed Apocalypse Meow

replies.body:
Hey, ApocaIypse Meow!

I really appreciate the shout-out. I'm always happy to help out where I can, and it's players like you that keep me coming back to Help & Support. ^.^

As a token of *my appreciation for you*, I've drawn up a [picture of Lucian](http://imgur.com/a/m9PLV), since I noticed you play him quite a bit.


http://imgur.com/a/wrAo0

Give one RP to this man.

tradition is tradition.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LMIIXE0A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-30T20:39:15.173+0000)
>
> Hey, ApocaIypse Meow!
> 
> I really appreciate the shout-out. I'm always happy to help out where I can, and it's players like you that keep me coming back to Help & Support. ^.^
> 
> As a token of *my appreciation for you*, I've drawn up a [picture of Lucian](http://imgur.com/a/m9PLV), since I noticed you play him quite a bit.
> 
> 
> http://imgur.com/a/wrAo0

That detail is breathtaking!  If only i could make this my summoner icon!

Thanks for the picture!
